title: BBC Local Live: Norfolk on Thursday, 23 June 2016 - BBC News
summary: flooding causes misery for norwich to london line passengers .
survivor speaks of ongoing impact of tunisian beach terror attack .
prince charles and camilla to attend royal norfolk show .
euro 2016 : norwich city duo help ireland beat italy .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: on the eve of an historic vote for the people of norfolk and the uk we end our coverage with a reminder of the main stories of the day here in the county :

documents.title: thousands of cars dock in great yarmouth
text: the biggest cargo ship to visit the port of great yarmouth has docked with a cargo of 3,000 cars .
the glovis splendour is 200m ( 219 yds ) long by 32m ( 40 yds ) wide .
with 11 decks she stands more than 30m ( 32 yds ) above the edge of great yarmouth harbour .
the vehicles began their journey in turkey , stopping in rotterdam before crossing the north sea .
virtually ever bit of available space around the port is being used the store the hyundai cars until they are ready to be taken to dealerships across britain .
author: Andrew Turner
BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: watch : heavy rainfall disrupts rail services
text: hundreds of network rail engineers have been out in force to pump water away from tracks and repair damage after heavy rain and flooding caused disruption to passengers .
flooding at four stations in essex meant it was unsafe to run trains through the affected area .
this short video shows the scene at manor park station in east london
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: euro 2016 : i owe them both a coffee
text: i 've been talking with the new sponsor of the south stand at norwich city football club who says he owes robbie brady and wes hoolahan a coffee after their recent goals for the republic of ireland in the euro championships .
the owners of the galway roast coffee shop , based in norwich 's london street , are sponsoring the stand after jarrold recently ended its 12-year partnership with the club .
co-owner john murphy ( right ) said it was amazing how the two norwich city players connected , describing last night 's set up and goal by the pair as `` absolutely sensational . ''
i told them i 'd give them a free coffee if they scored so that 's two coffees i have to give because wes scored the first goal in the first game and then robbie scored , so yeah that 's massive . ''
you can see more from john murphy on bbc look east tonight at 1830 on bbc one .
author: Tom Williams
BBC Look East sport

documents.title: high performance cars roll off the production line
text: two of the most `` extreme '' lotus models ever made have driven off the production line at the company 's hethel factory .
the lotus 3-eleven , finished in matt and gloss black , and the lotus elise cup 250 , in red , represent the latest generation of lotus sports cars , the company says .
with a maximum speed of 180 mph ( 290 km/h ) , the 3-eleven goes from from 0-60mph in 2.9 seconds..
trailing not far behind is the elise cup , boasting a top speed of 154 mph ( 248 km/h ) , reaching 0-60mph in 3.9 seconds .
jean-marc gales , head of group lotus plc , says the company has `` raised the bar yet again '' .
if you like talk of fast cars , do n't miss bbc radio norfolk 's petrol heads , tonight from 18:00 .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : further thunderstorms with locally heavy rain
text: this evening will see further thunderstorms , some heavy rain and lightning .
there 's also a risk of localised flooding .
these will clear out to sea leaving mostly dry conditions by the end of the night and lows of 15c ( 59f )
tomorrow will be a dry day with some early sunshine .
turning a little cloudy later .
a fresher atlantic air mass brings a fresher feel to the weather without the humidity of thursday .
weather has more details .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: heavy rainfall disrupts rail services
text: heavy rainfall disrupts rail services

documents.title: trains latest : floodiing disruption now expected until midnight
text: abellio greater anglia says disruption is expected to last until midnight .
there will be one train an hour on most routes going in and out of london .

documents.title: motorcyclist airlifted to hospital following collision
text: police are appealing for witnesses to a serious collision on the a17 at terrington st clement yesterday , involving two vehicles .
emergency services were called to the junction with station road where a blue toyota auris had collided with a blue yamaha r6 motorcycle , leaving the motorcyclist with multiple injuries .
the rider , a man in his 20s , was airlifted to addenbrooke 's hospital , cambridge , by a magpas helicopter crew .
the road was closed until 20:00 .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: inquest into broads cruiser deaths
text: an inquest into the deaths of two people found dead in a broads cruiser has been opened and adjourned .
the bodies of tina leticia wilkins , 51 , and alan frost , 64 , along with the body of their dog , were discovered on the boat moored on the river bure in wroxham broad on 9 june .
post-mortem examinations reveal that mr frost , a carpenter , and ms wilkins died through carbon monoxide poisoning .
the couple came from grays in essex .
the hearing has been adjourned until 30 november at norfolk coroners court .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : tunisian terror attack survivor speaks out
text: a king 's lynn woman says she 'll never forget the moment a tunisian beach holiday turned into a nightmare when a gunman opened fire killing 30 uk tourists .
angela evans was holidaying with a friend in the resort of sousse when the attack took place .
she was forced to `` play dead in the sand '' to survive .
twelve months on she has told bbc look east she is still haunted by the memories of the massacre and will never forget the sounds or the terror .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sam alger : inspection of spanish club found `` everything to be in order '' claims elrow
text: the elrow dance event has said their thoughts are with the family of sam alger , from norfolk , whose body was found near the spanish club on tuesday .
mr alger , 25 , had attended the club night on the outskirts of barcelona on sunday .
a spokeswoman for elrow told the bbc : `` we are very sad with what occurred to sam alger and that our thoughts are with his family .
`` the police and local authorities came to do an inspection at the club in the evening of sunday and found everything to be in order including safety , capacity , health , etc . ''

in response to accusations on social media there was `` chaos '' on leaving the venue the spokeswoman added : `` there was a public transport strike and we called the police to help solve the taxi situation , we doubled up our private buses services and called all the taxis at the airport . ''
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather update : more 'torrential ' rain on the way
text: sorry to bring you some bad news on the weather front but we 've more , a lot more , of the wet stuff on the way before the end of the afternoon .
the met office has issued an amber warning of rain for the east of england until 23:00 .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: rail company apologises for disruption
text: abellio greater anglia has apologised for the disruption affecting services between norfolk , suffolk and essex into london today .
in a statement , a spokesperson says this disruption is due to `` extensive flooding , caused by heavy rain , which has necessitated the closure of the lines between ilford and stratford . ''
network rail engineers are working to clear the lines as quickly as possible and passengers are encouraged to use alternative routes or delay their journeys where practical .
the train company says it 's working with network rail to restore the normal service as soon as possible and passengers affected by the disruption may be entitled to compensation .

documents.title: # manorpark flooding worsens
text: # manorpark - flooding has now worsened and all lines will be blocked into london until further notice .
rh
even cambridge ?
cambridge line is fine .
rh
is tfl running from liverpool street to shenfield ?
services are now terminating at gidea park/ .
rh

i 'm coming from london and need to get to chelmsford

documents.title: prince charles and camilla to attend royal norfolk show
text: organisers of the royal norfolk show say it 's a coup to be welcoming the prince of wales and the duchess of cornwall to this year 's event .
they 'll be at the showground on the opening day next wednesday and security will be stepped up to make sure the visit runs smoothly .
we 'll have updates from the showground throughout the two day event .

documents.title: rail delays may not be solved until 16:00
text: disruption to train services running through manor park , which was flooded earlier this morning , may now not be resolved until at least 16:00 according to abellio greater anglia .
a short while ago the train company said all services on the norwich to london line , which runs through ipswich and colchester , are terminating at shenfield/ilford .
# manorpark - services running through these stations may be cancelled or delayed by up to 90 mins .
disruption is expected until 16:00 .
rh
what are they trying to clear it with a straw ?
they are probably trying to mop it up with kitchen towel .
can we use tickets on @ twitterid later today .
many of us parked at basildon/laindon this morning .
ive asked 3 times , no reply
i have now been up for 21 hours .
is there anything going to colchester ?
@ twitterid disgusting level of service .
nothing until 4 ?
seriously ?
still

documents.title: tunisian terror attack survivor : gunman stood feet away
text: angela evans says she 's still haunted by the noise of gunshots , a year after she survived when a gunman opened fire on a crowded tunisian beach last june , killing 30 uk tourists .
in an interview with bbc look east ms evans described how the terrorist reloaded his gun just feet away from her , the discarded magazine landing by her hip .
`` he just stood there with this huge gun moving around all the people , shooting them , just killing , murdering then his feet were at the side of me , '' she said .
ms evans , who lives in west norfolk , was holidaying in sousse with a friend when the attack happened .
she was forced to `` play dead '' to save her life.. one year on , she still jumps at any loud bang .
you ca n't imagine the terror the sound for months afterwards if anything went bang i 'd look for somewhere to hide , even under the tables . ''
we 'll hear more from ms evans later today .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tunisian terror attack survivor speaks of impact on her life
text: twelve months after a gunman opened fire on a tunisian beach , killing 30 uk tourists , a norfolk woman who played dead in order to survive has spoken of the affect it 's had on her life .
angela evans , who was holiday in sousse with a friend , has had hours of counselling and says the past year has been a journey of emotions .
the so-called islamic state claimed responsibility for the terror attack .
speaking to bbc look east reporter debbie tubby , ms evans says despite her own difficulties coming to terms with what happened , every day she thinks about the `` poor people who were shot ``
i was happy as a child , happy growing up , i 've always been happy i feel that i 've had that taken away from me and i want to get that back . ''
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather update : a warning of thunder and hail
text: it 's worth keeping your wet weather gear to hand later as forecaster dan holley warns of stormy weather later :
e anglia : any sun that breaks through likely to trigger isolated to well-scattered thunderstorms later this afternoon .
sizeable hail perhaps

documents.title: travel updates : latest on abellio greater anglia trains
text: unfortunately problems remain on train services between norfolk , suffolk , essex and london due to flooding at manor park .
abellio greater anglia are saying there will be no through trains to and from norwich and london until at least midday .
here 's what is operating :
service update 10:50 - major disruption due to heavy flooding of the railway at # manorpark - updates : rh
any idea yet when services will resume ?
we expect no service until at least 13:00 .
rh
best route now to # london is change at romford from shenfield & get the district line , or c2c to fenchurch st .

documents.title: your a wet start to the day
text: it 's been a wet start to the day , and there 's more to come later .
this was the scene captured by bbc weather watcher in gorleston-on-sea earlier this morning .
if you have any weather photo you 'd like to share with us get in touch by email , or sign up to become a bbc weather watcher .

documents.title: thousands of lightning strikes across the east
text: thousands of lightning strikes were recorded overnight as flooding left rail users travelling from essex , suffolk and norfolk with long delays on thursday morning .
`` across southeast england , east anglia and northern france overnight , we had just under 7,000 lightning strikes averaging about 1,000 strikes per hour , '' said bbc weather 's carol kirkwood .
`` conditions are now improving but there will be more thunderstorms and torrential downpours later this afternoon . ''

documents.title: normal for norfolk : remember those eyebrows ?
text: desmond maccarthy , eccentric farmer and ( eyebrows ) star of the bbc tv series normal for norfolk , is one of the judge 's at next week 's royal norfolk show .
and just in case you 're wondering take a look at our feature on the origins of the phrase `` normal for norfolk '' .
desmond maccarthy , of normal for norfolk fame will be at the show as a trade stand judge # normalfornorfolk # rns16

documents.title: hoolahan : 'i owe brady a few drinks '
text: norwich city 's wes hoolahan will be up the tab the next time he goes out for a drink with team mate robbie brady .
brady headed in hoolahan 's cross in the 85th minute as republic of ireland beat italy 1-0 to qualify for the knockout stages of euro 2016 .
the goal came just a few moments after hoolahan had missed a glorious chance to give ireland the lead so he was grateful to brady for sparing his blushes .
wes hoolahan admits he owes @ twitterid team-mate robbie brady a or two after sparing his blushes against italy
author: Chris Goreham
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: duke and duchess of cambridge attend special charity gala dinner
text: the duke and duchess of cambridge attended a special gala dinner at houghton hall in north norfolk last night .
the event was organised by east anglia 's children 's hos ( each ) of which the duchess is patron .
about 80 guests , some of whom have travelled from around the world , were invited to the black tie evening , while being encouraged to make a donation to the charity 's nook appeal .
the appeal aims to raise £ 10m to transform children 's palliative care across norfolk , including building a new hos at framingham earl .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: emergency exercise at norwich chemical plant
text: if you 're near the chemical plant in norwich , do n't be alarmed :
a multi-agency live exercise is taking place at briar chemicals , # norwich today from 1000-1300 .
please do not be alarmed it is an exercise .
bring the bacon rolls lads !

documents.title: stars manager - 'we 're carrying too many passengers '
text: from football to speedway and king 's lynn stars boss rob lyon has criticised his team after they were beaten 49-41 by coventry at the norfolk arena last night .
niels-kristian iversen , robert lambert and simon lambert all scored well for the stars , but the other four riders in the team managed just eight points between them .
the result leaves lynn just one place off the bottom of the elite league .
lyon : `` there were too many passengers for us , and unfortunately you ca n't win meetings with only a few riders firing . ''
author: Chris Goreham
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: re-live that great moment of norwich city duo - brady and hoolahan
text: we ca n't say it enough .
or see it enough .
re-visit that hoolahan pass and robbie brady 's dramatic late winner that sealed the 1-0 win for the republic of ireland against italy , sending them into the last 16 of euro 2016 .
as they say in france `` allez les verts ! ''
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: euro 2016 : norwich city duo help ireland beat italy
text: robbie brady 's winning goal for republic of ireland against italy at euro 2016 is being hailed as one of the greatest moments in irish football history .
the norwich city player headed in a brilliant cross from fellow canary wes hoolahan in the 85th minute in lille to clinch a 1-0 win and take the irish through to the knockout stages .
ireland will now play the hosts france in the last 16 at the weekend .
author: Chris Goreham
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: weather : heavy rains and storms
text: heavy rains will continue this morning before a dry spell this afternoon with sunny spells , but torrential downpours are expected by later .
staying humid with temperatures reaching 23c ( 73f ) .
bbc weather has more details .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: update on train situation
text: here 's the latest information from abellio greater anglia :
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: abellio greater anglia advice is to travel via cambridge to london
text: coming up news of of the norwich city duo that helped ireland beat italy , but first more on the disruption to this morning 's rail services .
passengers from norfolk are being advised to travel via cambridge to get to london .
abellio greater anglia spokesman jonathan denby says at the moment only one train an hour is running to shenfield and to colchester from norwich until flooding ceases .
all tickets will be valid on this line .
the disruption , which is expected until about 10:00 , follows severe flooding at manor park .

documents.title: travel : flooding at postwick hub
text: travel warns of disruption for drivers :
postwick : bridget says it 's badly flooding at the postwick hub in the left lane towards the city - do take care on the approach .

documents.title: 'do not travel unless necessary ' , train passengers told
text: here 's a. of the flooding at manor park which is causing a lot of problems for commuters in essex , suffolk and norfolk .
abellio greater anglia says services to and from liverpool street will be cancelled , delayed by up to 90 minutes or revised .
they 've asked passengers not to travel unless necessary .
another of the heavy flooding currently blocking the lines at # manorpark

documents.title: good morning and welcome to norfolk live
text: hello and thanks for joining us for thursday 's norfolk live , where we 'll bring you the latest news , sport , travel and weather updates for the county .
among the stories we 'll be looking at today is the disruption facing rail passengers , after heavy rain caused services between norwich and london to be cancelled this morning due to flooding .
and of course more on that fantastic pass by norwich city 's wes hoolahan to teammate robbie brady in last night 's euro match which saw ireland beat italy 1-0 .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live
